activities:
Webloyalty.com, Inc. receives personally identifiable information regarding the customers of its wholly owned European subsidiary, Webloyalty International SARL. Webloyalty.com, Inc. acts as a Data Processor and processes data in accordance with instructions from the European subsidiary Data Controller. Webloyalty.com, Inc. supports the operations of its European subsidiary, including but not limited to information technology support, finance, legal, customer service and marketing.

privacyprograms: TRUSTe Safe Harbor Seal Program. In addition, Webloyalty.com, Inc. has instituted an in-house program to help ensure adherence to the safe harbor principles. This includes internal audits of personal information data flows, physical and electronic security reviews, employee training and periodic vulnerability assessments.
recoursemech: TRUSTe under its EU Safe Harbor Seal program will provide dispute resolution services to resolve unresolved complaints
